In the Matter of: Juan PEQUEÑO, Debtor. Juan Pequeño, Appellant, v. Aurora Loan Services Inc.; Joe Dela Fuente; Melissa Avalos; Enrique Perez, Appellees. No. 06-40748

Summary Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 15, 2007. Juan Pequeño, Brownsville, TX, pro se. Robert L. Negrin, Codilis & Stawiarski, Houston, TX, Dale Robertson, Brownsville, TX, for Appellees. Before KING, HIGGINBOTHAM, and GARZA, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM: *

For the reasons stated by the district court and bankruptcy court below, we AFFIRM. See 5th Cm. R. 47.6.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be
